verses.verse: When <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to him and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you want to, <S%G1410><s%> you can make <S%G2511><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> clean. <S%G2511><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stretched out <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I want <S%G2309><s%> to. <S%G2511><s%> Be made clean." Immediately <S%G2112><s%> his <S%G846><s%> leprosy <S%G3014><s%> was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "See <S%G3708><s%> that you tell <S%G2036><s%> nobody, <S%G3367><s%> but <S%G235><s%> go, <S%G5217><s%> show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest, <S%G2409><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> offer <S%G4374><s%> the gift <S%G1435><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>"

When <S%G1525><s%> he <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> a centurion <S%G1543><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> asking <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> lies <S%G906><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> paralyzed, <S%G1171><s%> grievously tormented. <S%G928><s%>"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> will come and <S%G2064><s%> heal <S%G2323><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

The centurion <S%G1543><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> I <S%G1510><s%>'m not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> for <S%G2443><s%> you to come <S%G1525><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> roof. <S%G4721><s%> Just <S%G3440><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> will be healed. <S%G2390><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> also a man <S%G444><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> soldiers. <S%G4757><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> one, <S%G4198><s%> 'Go,' and <S%G2532><s%> he goes; <S%G4198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tell another, <S%G243><s%> <S%G2064><s%> 'Come,' and <S%G2532><s%> he comes; <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tell my <S%G3450><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> <S%G4160><s%> 'Do this, <S%G5124><s%>' and <S%G2532><s%> he does it. <S%G4160><s%>"

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, <S%G2296><s%> he marveled, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to those who followed, <S%G190><s%> "Most certainly <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> I <S%G2147><s%> haven't <S%G3761><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> a faith, <S%G4102><s%> not <S%G3761><s%> even in <S%G1722><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east <S%G395><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the west, <S%G1424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will sit down <S%G347><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Heaven, <S%G3772><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> will be thrown out <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the outer <S%G1857><s%> darkness. <S%G4655><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the centurion, <S%G1543><s%> "Go your way. <S%G5217><s%> Let <S%G5613><s%> it be done <S%G1096><s%> for you <S%G4671><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> have believed. <S%G4100><s%>" His <S%G846><s%> servant <S%G3816><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> hour. <S%G5610><s%>

When <S%G2064><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%>'s house, <S%G3614><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G3994><s%>'s mother lying <S%G906><s%> sick with a fever. <S%G4445><s%>

He touched <S%G680><s%> her <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her. <S%G846><s%> She got up <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> served <S%G1247><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> they brought <S%G4374><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> possessed with demons. <S%G1139><s%> He cast out <S%G1544><s%> the spirits <S%G4151><s%> with <S%G3056><s%> a word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> healed <S%G2323><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who were <S%G2192><s%> sick; <S%G2560><s%>

that <S%G3704><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> which was spoken <S%G4483><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying: <S%G3004><s%> "He <S%G846><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities, <S%G769><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bore <S%G941><s%> our diseases. <S%G3554><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> he gave the order <S%G2753><s%> to depart <S%G565><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other side. <S%G4008><s%>

A <S%G1520><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> I will follow <S%G190><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> you go. <S%G565><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "The foxes <S%G258><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> holes, <S%G5454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> have nests, <S%G2682><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> nowhere <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G4226><s%> lay <S%G2827><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>"

Another <S%G2087><s%> of <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> allow <S%G2010><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bury <S%G2290><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> father. <S%G3962><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Follow <S%G190><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> leave <S%G863><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> to bury <S%G2290><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> own dead. <S%G3498><s%>"
When <S%G1684><s%> he <S%G846><s%> got <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a boat, <S%G4143><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a violent <S%G3173><s%> storm <S%G4578><s%> came <S%G2532><s%> up <S%G1096><s%> on the sea, <S%G2281><s%> so much that <S%G5620><s%> the boat <S%G4143><s%> was covered <S%G2572><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the waves, <S%G2949><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was asleep. <S%G2518><s%>

They came <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G4334><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> woke <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up, <S%G3004><s%> saying, "Save <S%G4982><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> Lord! <S%G2962><s%> We are dying! <S%G622><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2075><s%> fearful, <S%G1169><s%> O you <S%G2075><s%> of little faith? <S%G3640><s%>" Then <S%G5119><s%> he got up, <S%G1453><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>

The men <S%G444><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What kind of man <S%G4217><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>"

When <S%G2064><s%> he <S%G846><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the other side, <S%G4008><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of the Gergesenes, <S%G1086><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> people possessed by demons <S%G1139><s%> met <S%G5221><s%> him <S%G846><s%> there, <S%G1831><s%> coming out of <S%G1537><s%> the tombs, <S%G3419><s%> exceedingly <S%G3029><s%> fierce, <S%G5467><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> nobody <S%G3361><s%> could <S%G2480><s%> pass <S%G3928><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> way. <S%G3598><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> they cried out, <S%G2896><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do we <S%G2254><s%> have to do <S%G2532><s%> with you, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> Have you come <S%G2064><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> to torment <S%G928><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the time? <S%G2540><s%>"
Now <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a herd <S%G34><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> pigs <S%G5519><s%> feeding <S%G1006><s%> far away <S%G3112><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> demons <S%G1142><s%> begged <S%G3870><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> you cast <S%G1544><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> out, <S%G1544><s%> permit <S%G2010><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to go away <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the herd <S%G34><s%> of pigs. <S%G5519><s%>"

He said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go! <S%G5217><s%>" They <S%G1161><s%> came out, <S%G1831><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the herd <S%G34><s%> of pigs: <S%G5519><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> herd <S%G34><s%> of pigs <S%G5519><s%> rushed <S%G3729><s%> down <S%G2596><s%> the cliff <S%G2911><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> died <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the water. <S%G5204><s%>

Those <S%G1161><s%> who fed them <S%G1006><s%> fled, <S%G5343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> went away into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G518><s%> everything, <S%G3956><s%> including <S%G2532><s%> what happened <S%G3588><s%> to those who were possessed with demons. <S%G1139><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> came <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> meet <S%G4877><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> When they saw <S%G1492><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> they begged <S%G3870><s%> that <S%G3704><s%> he would depart <S%G3327><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> borders. <S%G3725><s%>
